title: Dez Squeeze, a new font from Dezcom!
content:
Give it up for Dezcom, who has a new typeface for sale over at MyFonts!

[Dez Squeeze™](http://web.archive.org/web/20090525143750/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/dezcom/dez-squeeze/)
author: Ricardo Cordoba

comments.content:
Guess who, Ricardo?

Check this out:

[http://typophile.com/node/58191](http://web.archive.org/web/20090525143750/http:/typophile.com/node/58191 "http://typophile.com/node/58191")

ChrisL

Awwww.... I shoulda checked the Release Forum!!!

Shoulda, coulda woulda...

“Shoulda, coulda woulda”

Those should be the names of the different weights Chris : )

Michael

Those should be the names of the type families I should have already released! :-)

ChrisL
I shoulda deleted this thread... but now I won’t. ;-D

Ricardo, don’t delete it. I should delete this one, it was my comic release version:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/58187](http://web.archive.org/web/20090525143750/http:/typophile.com/node/58187 "http://typophile.com/node/58187")  
because nobody saw it. I guess NOBODY looks at blogs on Typophile :-)

ChrisL

James Brown would have been a great Charmin spokesman!

ChrisL

Maybe you could get Luke Sullivan to redesign his book cover with your typeface:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090525143750im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hey-whipple-squeeze-this_3779.jpg)
